title: Course on Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Through Simulation/VR-Based Reading Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics comprehension and basic digital device manipulation
context.additional_context: Training in applying reading strategies in a virtual environment reflecting real job situations

learning_goals: Learners can select and apply reading strategies (problem-solving, global, supportive strategies) suited to various math problem types with over 85% accuracy depending on the context.
Learners can integrate at least three metacognitive strategies while solving job-related math problems in a VR simulation environment.
Through project-based assessments, learners can analyze the effectiveness of reading strategies in real work settings and write reflective reports of over 500 characters.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
